bug.author: coatless
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h4>Issue description</denchmark-h>

Mismatch on return types in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/ensmallen/blob/b46986d1344551b1d8480784661b7c547304ba04/include/ensmallen_bits/pso/pso.hpp>PSO</denchmark-link>

<denchmark-code>../inst/include/ensmallen_bits/pso/pso.hpp: In member function ‚Äòsize_t ens::PSOType<VelocityUpdatePolicy, InitPolicy>::LowerBound() const‚Äô:
../inst/include/ensmallen_bits/pso/pso.hpp:162:38: error: cannot convert ‚Äòconst vec‚Äô {aka ‚Äòconst arma::Col<double>‚Äô} to ‚Äòsize_t‚Äô {aka ‚Äòlong unsigned int‚Äô} in return
  162 |   size_t LowerBound() const { return lowerBound; }
      |                                      ^~~~~~~~~~
</denchmark-code>

Defined as arma::vec:



ensmallen/include/ensmallen_bits/pso/pso.hpp


        Lines 207 to 210
      in
      b46986d






 //! Lower bound of the initial swarm. 



 arma::vec lowerBound; 



 //! Upper bound of the initial swarm. 



 arma::vec upperBound; 





But returning size_t:



ensmallen/include/ensmallen_bits/pso/pso.hpp


        Lines 161 to 171
      in
      b46986d






 //! Retrieve value of lowerBound. 



 size_t LowerBound() const { return lowerBound; } 



 



 //! Modify value of lowerBound. 



 size_t& LowerBound() { return lowerBound; } 



 



 //! Retrieve value of upperBound. 



 size_t UpperBound() const { return upperBound; } 



 



 //! Modify value of upperBound. 



 size_t& UpperBound() { return upperBound; } 





<denchmark-h:h4>Your environment</denchmark-h>


version of ensmallen: 1.16.0
operating system: debian
compiler: gcc-9
version of Armadillo: 9.600

comments.comment: Thanks for the report, should be fixed in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/ensmallen/pull/124>#124</denchmark-link> , I will put some time into the test setup, so that we can avoid such issues in the future.
Fixed in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/ensmallen/pull/124>#124</denchmark-link> . Thanks for the report.
Ah, I discovered that <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/ensmallen/pull/126>#126</denchmark-link> will also be necessary here.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/rcurtin>@rcurtin</denchmark-link> sorry about that. I should have grabbed the entire log. :/
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had any recent activity. It will be closed in 7 days if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions! üëç
